subject:
Re: [R] Dealing with data frame column names beginning with a
	numeric
body:
On Mon, 16-Apr-2007 at 04:29PM -0400, Gabor Grothendieck wrote:

|> Try this:
|> 
|> boxplot(data.frame(mat), names = colnames(mat))
|> 


Great! Now why didn't I think of that?....
